masterFinding.remediationInstructions: Configure the VPN solution to enforce the use of Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA).
masterFinding.name: Remote Management Interface - VPN - MFA Not Enabled
masterFinding.businessImpact: An attacker may be able to conduct password guess attacks with a known user list and gain unauthorized access to internal network resources over VPN.
masterFinding.description: Virtual Private Network (VPN) technology is used by a client system to securely connect to a private Local Area Network (LAN) from a remote location. The affected VPN servers don't appear to require Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA).
